modName: Duel Combat Realism and T3nd0's SkyRe Combat Module Compatibility Patch
summary:
This small patch just carries forward the changes made by both mod in the few cases they edit the same vanilla FormID.
In short, it allow you to use both Duel mod and SkyRe_Combat module without loosing what none have to offer, and you no longer need to delete SkyRe_Combat to use Duel.
descriptionHtml:
This small patch just carries forward the changes made by both mod in the few cases they use the edit the same vanilla FormID, as seen at the screenshot:

Only 5 FormIDs are overlapping between the two mods:

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/57245-1-1408450197.png[/img]﻿

Duel just lower are few values, were it makes the game even harder then SkyRe make it:

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/57245-2-1408450197.png[/img]

So this patch maintain all jazzy from both amazing mods:

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/57245-3-1408450198.png[/img]

They are quite few values, but it allow you to use both Duel mod and SkyRe_Combat module without loosing what none have to offer, and you no longer need to delete SkyRe_Combat to use Duel.

Suggested load order:
...
Duel - Combat Realism.esp
SkyRe_Combat.esp
Duel-SkyRe Patch.esp
...

Doesn't really matter who's first as long the patch cames last.

Uploading by recommendation of LogRaam, from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2700/?]Duel - Combat Realism[/url], thank you for your mod and your suggestion;
Thank's to T3ndo, from the great [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286/?]T3nd0s Skyrim Redone[/url]﻿.
author: justjr
